PP.content: written traces don’t belong to phusis, not alive, or belong to Heraclitean phusis, in which truth takes shelter in its crypt (à s’abriter en sa crypte) > “cryptogram” is a pleonasm
PP.linkedContent: written traces don’t belong to phusis, not alive, or belong to Heraclitean phusis, in which truth takes shelter in its crypt (à s’abriter en sa crypte) > “cryptogram” is a pleonasm

PP.content: acc. king, pharmakon hypnotizes life of memory, taking it out of itself (la faisant sortir de soi) by monumentalizing it: médusée (medusad)
PP.linkedContent: acc. king, pharmakon hypnotizes life of memory, taking it out of itself (la faisant sortir de soi) by monumentalizing it: médusée (medusad)

PAS.content: isn’t the thought of la paralyse a thought of the obscene Medusa? good for laughter too
PAS.linkedContent: isn’t the thought of la paralyse a thought of the obscene Medusa? good for laughter too

F.content: paelontologist médusé devant l’arête d’un mot-chose, like a tomb burning in the grass, double-edged stare of a 2-faced Medusa (le double tranchant d’un biface)
F.linkedContent: paelontologist médusé devant l’arête d’un mot-chose, like a tomb burning in the grass, double-edged stare of a 2-faced Medusa (le double tranchant d’un biface)

O.content: to understand this network [Derrida has just proliferated footnote w/ gratings, columns, squares, stones and poisons from Maldoror] by way of “this is that,” one would lose about everything in the expectation (pour attendre)
O.linkedContent: to understand this network [Derrida has just proliferated footnote w/ gratings, columns, squares, stones and poisons from Maldoror] by way of “this is that,” one would lose about everything in the expectation (pour attendre)

O.content: pierre d’attente, pierre d’angle, pierre d’achoppement auront, dès la porche de la Dissémination, mais aussi plus tôt, muni le trébuchet, encombrant l’examen du lecteur médusé [glut the gorgonized reader]
O.linkedContent: pierre d’attente, pierre d’angle, pierre d’achoppement auront, dès la porche de la Dissémination, mais aussi plus tôt, muni le trébuchet, encombrant l’examen du lecteur médusé [glut the gorgonized reader]

O.content: [Derrida proceeds to link the stone to the phallus and then to Freud’s Das Medusenhaupt, what if the phallus has no center?]
O.linkedContent: [Derrida proceeds to link the stone to the phallus and then to Freud’s Das Medusenhaupt, what if the phallus has no center?]

O.content: if “assumption” of castration is same as denial of it: “apotropaics would always have one more surprise up its sleeve (plus d’une suprise)”
O.linkedContent: if “assumption” of castration is same as denial of it: “apotropaics would always have one more surprise up its sleeve (plus d’une suprise)”

REST.content: shoes sheath (gainent), to what profit, what sex? an undone stricture of laces, the girdle too, perhaps allows (donnerait) to be seen [Derrida quotes Balzac describing a naked, living, female foot protruding from a canvas—visitors médusés]
REST.linkedContent: shoes sheath (gainent), to what profit, what sex? an undone stricture of laces, the girdle too, perhaps allows (donnerait) to be seen [Derrida quotes Balzac describing a naked, living, female foot protruding from a canvas—visitors médusés]

AFR.content: [re: need to desire, desire as end w/out end] moment stone (statue) comes to life, works to reduce gap, (not) become dead again—contrary to frivolous distraction, to headstrong identity of signs: fear of Medusa, legitimacy itself [fear of frivolous = fear of Medusa?]
AFR.linkedContent: [re: need to desire, desire as end w/out end] moment stone (statue) comes to life, works to reduce gap, (not) become dead again—contrary to frivolous distraction, to headstrong identity of signs: fear of Medusa, legitimacy itself [fear of frivolous = fear of Medusa?]

D.content: liminary question, Medusa, stone, flange, pierre d’angle et d’attente (cornerstone, toothing stone) > other enumeration, squarely written, remains in reserve, undecipherable
D.linkedContent: liminary question, Medusa, stone, flange, pierre d’angle et d’attente (cornerstone, toothing stone) > other enumeration, squarely written, remains in reserve, undecipherable

+R.content: rigor/joyous severity of trait, petrifying (médusante) impassivity of line > disjunction works on any equality, unhinges, interrupts, truncates > “integrity in dispersion”
+R.linkedContent: rigor/joyous severity of trait, petrifying (médusante) impassivity of line > disjunction works on any equality, unhinges, interrupts, truncates > “integrity in dispersion”

TN.content: death threatens the promise (promise of death), giving to see the mortuary mask in the face beyond face; less the “already-ethical” of caress/profanation than a remainder of shame (reste de honte), of profanation/treachery/perjury in the ethical
TN.linkedContent: death threatens the promise (promise of death), giving to see the mortuary mask in the face beyond face; less the “already-ethical” of caress/profanation than a remainder of shame (reste de honte), of profanation/treachery/perjury in the ethical

TN.content: “loi du tact: tout commence, et la fidélité même, et le serment, par un impardonnable parjure”
TN.linkedContent: “loi du tact: tout commence, et la fidélité même, et le serment, par un impardonnable parjure”

TN.content: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic
TN.linkedContent: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic

BSi.content: Celan: the artist turns nature to stone, “be a Medusa’s head” (monkey, automata, art)
